Experiments in the FDG-PET image database of 109 patients provided evidence to support 2 assertions: (1) The proposed method, which uses only features derived from a single FDG-PET modality, can be superior to existing methods that use multimodal features in the sMCI versus pMCI classification task; (2) the proposed network can learn the discriminant mode from the difference ROIs to obtain a more robust classifier with better discriminant performance.
